item.title: 2-Minute Executive Summary
item.description: 2-Minute Executive Summary The Crimes McDonald’s ran global promotional games, falsely presenting them as fair games of chance. In reality, the company repeatedly misrepresented the odds of winning, often outright falsifying the real probabilities. This was not just deceptive marketing. It was calculated fraud of the most vicious kind. These mafia-like methods constitute mass-marketing consumer fraud and money laundering. They also fall within the scope of
